name: Anpanman to Asobo: New Aiueo Kyoushitsu
name_original: Anpanman to Asobo: New Aiueo Kyoushitsu
description:
Anpanman to Asobo: New Aiueo Kyoushitsu is an educational game developed by Agatsuma Entertainment. It came out on 27-02-2014. Agatsuma Entertainment published the game.
You can play Anpanman to Asobo: New Aiueo Kyoushitsu on Nintendo 3DS.
